name: Pieces (itch) (Tamogauk, NyctoManiac)
description:
You are a little girl, trying to escape the screen. In order to achieve
this objective, you have to first repair the disassembled mobile. If you connect the broken mobile pieces into a working structure, it will begin to move and open your exit.

Team:
Maksim Martynov: Programming & Project Lead
Clara Georgi: Design
Ehsan Tabesh: Sound Design
Aizhan Konuspayeva: Art
